title: The Russian Front.Stalingrad to Berlin
description:
The Titanic struggle fought between the armies of Hitler and Stalin from
1941 through to 1945 is without parallel in the history of warfare.
The most men, tanks  .artillery and aircraft ever assembled ground out
a terrifying war of attrition  which descended int merciless barbarism
as the stakes grew even higher.
